definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: (except Le 6:20 [[עָלֶיהָ]], but Sam. [[עליו]], cf. Di in loco Kö:i. 182) garment, covering—Ge 28:2 + 36 t.; sf. [[בִּגְדוֹ]] Ez Eze 9:3 + (14 t. without dag. lene Ges:Lgb. 94); pl. [[בְּגׇדִים]] Le 6:4 + 32 t.; cstr. [[בִּגְדֵי]] Ge 27:15 + 39 t.; sf. [[בְּגׇדֶיךָ]] 1Ki 22:20 + 81 t.; [[בִּגְדׂתֶיךָ]] Ps 45:9; —

garment, clothing, raiment, robe of any kind, from the filthy clothing of the leper to the holy robes of the high priest, the simplest covering of the poor as well as the costly raiment of the rich and noble, used throughout Heb. Lit.: Ge 24:53 (J), Ge 28:20 (E; 14 t. JE), Ex 28:2 + (P 90 t.), De 24:17, Ju Jdg 8:26 + 4 t., 1Sa 19:13 + 10 t., 1Ki 1:1 + 23 t., 2Ch 18:9 + (Chr 9 t.), Es 4:1, Es 4:4, Job 13:28, Job 22:6, Job 37:17, Ps 22:19, Ps 45:9, Ps 102:27, Ps 109:19, Pr 6:27, Pr 20:16, Pr 25:20, Pr 27:13, Ec 9:8, Is:Is 2, Is 24:16, Is 36:22, Is 37:1, Is:Is 3, Is 50:9 + 10 t., Je 12:1 + 3 t., Ez Eze 16:16 + 13 t., Joe 2:13, Am 2:8, Hag 2:12, Zec 3:3, Zec 3:4, Zec 3:5, Zec 14:14; [[מְלאׁ בִגְדוֹ]] his lap-ful 2Ki 4:39.
covering, wrapping, of furniture of tabernacle Nu 4:6 – 13 (6 t.); coverlet of a bed 1Sa 19:13.
